messages.message: Hey Germany, would you be interested in a peace between us, at least in the beginning?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Hey Germany, would you be interested in a peace between us, at least in the beginning?'.

messages.message: I don't think either of us would benefit of starting a quibble when there's other powers at our borders.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I don't think either of us would benefit of starting a quibble when there's other powers at our borders.'.

messages.message: I’d be more than happy to oblige. From what I hear you’re going to have your hands full in the easy anyways. DMZ Tyrolia and Bohemia?
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'I’d be more than happy to oblige. From what I hear you’re going to have your hands full in the easy anyways. DMZ Tyrolia and Bohemia?'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's proposal to establish a demilitarized zone (DMZ) in Tyrolia and Bohemia aligns with the initial discussion of seeking peace and cooperation, indicating a genuine intent to maintain friendly relations and stability between your territories.

messages.message: Sounds good. If things change with Italy, I'll let you know.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Sounds good. If things change with Italy, I'll let you know.'.

messages.message: It seems turkey has decided to side with germany
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'It seems turkey has decided to side with germany'.

messages.message: Russia, sorry
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Russia, sorry'.

messages.message: If you could build appropriately for a push to War, I can support from the south
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'If you could build appropriately for a push to War, I can support from the south'.

messages.message: I bounced Sweden for that reason
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'I bounced Sweden for that reason'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's explanation of bouncing in Sweden to convey their commitment to your shared plan of supporting a push towards War shows a consistent approach to cooperation and strategic alignment, indicating a trustworthy response in the game.

messages.message: i'm going to Silesia.  you're in a bit of a pickle but hopefully you can get out of it to go anti russia.
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'i'm going to Silesia.  you're in a bit of a pickle but hopefully you can get out of it to go anti russia.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's tone of offering a strategy for you to navigate the situation, while also expressing hope for your ability to counter Russia, indicates a supportive and collaborative approach, suggesting a reliable ally in pursuing common objectives.

messages.message: Thanks. It should be fine if we can get 1 back on R.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Thanks. It should be fine if we can get 1 back on R.'.

messages.message: Can I ask Italy to help with Vie or would you rather Tyr stay clear?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Can I ask Italy to help with Vie or would you rather Tyr stay clear?'.

messages.message: rather it stay clear
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'rather it stay clear'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's preference for Tyrolia to remain clear of involvement indicates respect for your diplomatic inquiry and a desire to maintain a peaceful situation in that area, suggesting a cooperative and trustworthy stance in the ongoing negotiations.

messages.message: ok
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'ok'.

messages.message: I'll be supporting your hold in Vienna.  Anything to hurt the russians.  Make sure to tap Trieste to ensure you keep it.
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'I'll be supporting your hold in Vienna.  Anything to hurt the russians.  Make sure to tap Trieste to ensure you keep it.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's offer to support your hold in Vienna in order to weaken Russia, along with the strategic advice to tap Trieste, shows a cooperative and mutually beneficial approach, indicating a trustworthy and reliable ally in pursuing common objectives against a shared rival.

messages.message: Thanks. Italy decided to stab me this turn for some reason
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Thanks. Italy decided to stab me this turn for some reason'.

messages.message: After going through a very painful Lepanto. Throw it all out
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'After going through a very painful Lepanto. Throw it all out'.

messages.message: What are your plans for coming year? Do you plan to put more pressure on War?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'What are your plans for coming year? Do you plan to put more pressure on War?'.

messages.message: If R supports or moves bud for Tri, I could support Boh to Gal
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'If R supports or moves bud for Tri, I could support Boh to Gal'.

messages.message: What do you think about trying to move to Gal?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'What do you think about trying to move to Gal?'.

messages.message: Why don’t I support you into Gal?
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Why don’t I support you into Gal?'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's offer to support your unit into Galicia demonstrates a cooperative attitude and a willingness to assist you in achieving your strategic goals, indicating a reliable and supportive ally in the game.

messages.message: I'll try to push out with Vie this turn. If you could use Boh to attack Gal that would be good for both of us
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I'll try to push out with Vie this turn. If you could use Boh to attack Gal that would be good for both of us'.

messages.message: Also, F seems poised to take England, after which F has 13 CP
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Also, F seems poised to take England, after which F has 13 CP'.

messages.message: I'm attacking Vie with Tyr
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I'm attacking Vie with Tyr'.
